title: Fix the fucking GA exploit.
body:
Jesus fucking Christ. Someone in my last match got a fucking Quadra while reviving and we couldn't do anything about it.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SwNX44umrh0

That's the best example I could that Kali who did it had no idea she could, if they know you can auto they will and you cant do anything about it.

Fix your shit Riot.

replies.body: Yeah had this happen with Kalista, forgot to send in support ticket about it.

Rofl X file 

Upvote for good video

> [{quoted}](name=Your Neighbour,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=zvuP8vfH,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-03-24T10:33:53.194+0000)
>
> Rofl X file 
> 
> Upvote for good video

That's not mine, I don't play on low graphic settings.

Seen it also on Machinmarealm YouTube channel in one of their wtf moments videos,  Aatrox got a kill while in respawn passive thing. So it's not restricted to ga or kalista, rather reviving{{champion:266}} {{champion:429}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
I think it was because her aas can't be cancelled unless she dies but she was in a stasis and the aa was already starting so her passive made her aa

> [{quoted}](name=Mar3thyu,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=zvuP8vfH,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-03-24T04:23:22.339+0000)
>
> I think it was because her aas can't be cancelled unless she dies but she was in a stasis and the aa was already starting so her passive made her aa

Yes, exactly it can also be done with Zhonyas, and it's fucking annoying and Riot wont fix it.
